title.rendered: “Breaking News: IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terrorist Cell in Belayda – Behind the Latest Cross-Border Conflict”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a terrorist cell that was seen leaving a military building in the Belayda area.

An aircraft identified a terrorist squad exiting a military building of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Belayda area. Combat aircraft attacked the cell and two additional military structures in the area.

Earlier, air defense fighters intercepted a suspected aerial target that had crossed from Lebanese territory into Israeli territory in the area of Finger of the Galilee.

In the last hours, missile launches have been identified from Lebanon to Israel in the areas of Margaliot, Mount Dov, Kiryat Shmona, Manara, and Malkia. IDF forces attacked the sources of fire.

Attached is documentation from the attack: https://bit.ly/49pErAl
